scripts.dev: concurrently -k "next dev" "tsc -w -p tsconfig.electron.json" "node -e \"const fs = require('fs'); if (fs.existsSync('electron/prisma-client')) fs.cpSync('electron/prisma-client', 'dist-electron/prisma-client', {recursive: true})\" && wait-on http://localhost:3000 dist-electron/main.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=development electron dist-electron/main.js"
scripts.build:electron: tsc -p tsconfig.electron.json && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); if (fs.existsSync('electron/prisma-client')) fs.cpSync('electron/prisma-client', 'dist-electron/prisma-client', {recursive: true})"
scripts.build: npm run build:web && npm run build:electron
scripts.dist: npm run build && cross-env CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false ELECTRON_BUILDER_DISABLE_CODE_SIGNING=true electron-builder -w
